Name: Party Maker
About the game: / / Party Maker is a simulator of an event agency that organizes events in amazing places. Birthdays, weddings, bachelor parties or Halloween fun in an extraordinary space. Unleash your creativity, get the right equipment, prepare a place, use what you find. CLEAN - REPAIR Clear the level of rubbish to pimp the party spot. DECORATE Lots of amazing decorations to choose from. DESIGN A UNIQUE FIRESHOW To get a REAL blast, you might want to design your own firework show! HAVE A LOT OF FUN Discover additional activities and unique quests on each level. If you like puzzles or are passionate about classical and electronic music or even motorization you will find lots of fun. Here are the most important tips of a crazy party maker: Complete various orders of your clients. Take care of the budget and clients' satisfaction. By making parties for others, you collect money for your own event. It will be your final task. Various types of tools will help you in decorating and renovating. Sometimes you will have to deal with unexpected events and also meet extraordinary characters. Find and unlock catalogs to gain access to new decorations. Create items from the junk you find. Arrange items freely. If you run out of ideas, you can use the patterns we set for you. Thanks to the large number of decorations, Party Maker gives you the opportunity to create the party of your dreams, arranging unusual places, creating unique atmosphere, and, above all, it can be an inspiration for your own real-life Party.
